translations.name: Portuguese Bible
translations.description: The Holy Bible was translated by João Ferreira de Almeida in 1861. The Revised Edition of this translation (published in 1959 and 1993) retains the main characteristics of formal equivalence used by the original Almeida translation while remaining faithful to the original texts.
